name: magnet
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Electric moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Electric-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.black_white: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a powerful magnet that boosts the power of Electric-type moves.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a powerful magnet that boosts the power of Electric-type moves.
